name: christmas eve wishes
notes:
this is the whole 6 part christmas eve wishes cal pattern in one, easy to download, advert free document.


the whole pattern is made up of simple stitches and repeated elements. once you have mastered the techniques it is a simple and relaxing make. if you are a confident beginner you should have no problem making it. there are detailed picture tutorials to guide you every step of the way. i have included lots of colour ways to give you ideas and a colouring in sheet to design your own!

this pattern is available in uk terms and us terms. this download is the uk version.

there are video tutorials to accompany this pattern on you tube, linked in the pattern.

also free as a cal: https://madebyanita.co.uk/blog/christmas-eve-wishes-cal-week-one
